event.title: was opened to new settlers on August 6, 1901

data.event: A community called Bayard existed at the site of present-day Hastings until the Kiowa, Comanche, and Apache Reservation was opened to new settlers on August 6, 1901.

event.title: 1902, a railroad line called Enid and Anadarko built

data.event: In 1902, a railroad line called Enid and Anadarko built tracks through Hastings.
